Configdir
=========

A `configdir` is a directory-based configuration system where each
configuration option is represented by the filename and the
configuration value by the contents of the file. The files usually
contain a single line which represents the value of the configuration
item.

TODO

  * Support multi-valued configuration attributes
  * File extensions to signify the type of variable - boolean, string, number, array, hash
  * Support for comments within configdir files
  * Support for git within a configdir (instead of just writing to a file, it will commit a new version of the configuration)
  * Perform error checking & safe file reading

Inspiration
-----------
